title: Tiered Instructor Scaffolding Strategies for Collaborative Knowledge Building

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A collaboration-centered learning environment for strengthening science-related job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners enhance scientific problem-solving abilities through group collaboration under three-tier (high/medium/low) instructor scaffolding support

Learners experience phased characteristics—individual perspective sharing → question-based processing → collective deep exploration—in collaborative knowledge-building processes using LMS discussion boards
Learners derive three or more creative solutions for complex scientific problems presented in summative assessments by group

resources: LMS system (discussion board, group assignment tools)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
